scripts.start: REACT_APP_VIDISPINE_URL=$VIDISPINE_URL REACT_APP_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` react-scripts start
scripts.build-container: export REACT_APP_GIT_COMMIT=$npm_package_version && react-scripts build && docker build -t "${npm_package_name}:latest" -t "${npm_package_name}:${REACT_APP_GIT_COMMIT}" .
scripts.build-container-dev: export REACT_APP_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` && react-scripts build && docker build -t "${npm_package_name}:latest" -t "${npm_package_name}:${REACT_APP_GIT_COMMIT}" .
scripts.save-container: export REACT_APP_GIT_COMMIT=$npm_package_version && docker image save -o vidijs_${REACT_APP_GIT_COMMIT}.tar.gz vidijs:$REACT_APP_GIT_COMMIT && echo "Exported vidijs_${REACT_APP_GIT_COMMIT}.tar.gz"
scripts.save-container-dev: export REACT_APP_GIT_COMMIT=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` && docker image save -o vidijs_${REACT_APP_GIT_COMMIT}.tar.gz vidijs:$REACT_APP_GIT_COMMIT && echo "Exported vidijs_${REACT_APP_GIT_COMMIT}.tar.gz"
